author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: AgriFORCE Launches Gas-Powered Bitcoin Mining Site in Alberta, Plans Expansion to 1 EH/s
description: AgriFORCE brings stranded natural gas online for crypto mining and compute with its new Alberta site.
content:
AgriFORCE Growing Systems (AGRI), a small agricultural firm that recently adopted bitcoin mining, has launched its first bitcoin 
 mining and digital compute site in Berwyn, Alberta, using stranded … [+1965 chars]
